metadata.name: MechEggType03
metadata.description:
A unique physical and digital work of art and design by Belgian designer Peter Donders. A physical sculpture complemented by an additional NFT.

Physical model
nr. of parts: 11
1 3D printed resin egg + paint 85 gr
9 3D printed 316 steel 320 gr + 18k Gold
1 Crate 940 gr
Dim. W 147mm D 128mm H 256mm
Crate W 188mm D 170mm H 305mm
Digital Model:
GLB files
jpeg files

For the physical MechEgg we would like to get your shipping information
